title: Version Command Unification Complete
details:
Successfully unified the --version and version command outputs for the Notebook Automation CLI:

CHANGES MADE:
1. Made ShowVersionInfo() method public in Program.cs for shared access
2. Removed duplicate ShowVersionInfo() method from VersionCommands.cs
3. Updated VersionCommands.cs to call Program.ShowVersionInfo()
4. Fixed configuration file display logic to exclude both --version and version commands
5. Professional formatted output with colors and consistent styling

RESULTS:
- Both na.exe --version and na.exe version now show identical output
- No configuration file message displayed for either version command
- Only single command execution (no multiple version displays)
- Professional output format with proper spacing and colors
- Unified codebase with no duplication

OUTPUT FORMAT:
```
Notebook Automation v1.0.527.67
Runtime: .NET 9.0.5  
Author:  Dan Shue
Copyright 2025
```

COMMITTED AND PUSHED:
- Changes pushed to trigger new CI build with unified version display
- New CI artifacts will have consistent version behavior
- Ready for final testing once CI completes
